name: Estrogen-progestogen oral contraceptives (combined)
info: NB There is "evidence suggesting lack of carcinogenicity" for combined estrogen-progestogen oral  contraceptives in humans and cancers of the endometrium, ovary, and colorectum. An inverse association has been  observed between combined estrogen-progestogen oral contraceptives and cancers of the endometrium, ovary, and colorectum.
